## WorkspaceSvg.updateToolbox() method

Modify the block tree on the existing toolbox.

**Signature:**

```typescript
updateToolbox(toolboxDef: toolbox.ToolboxDefinition | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toolboxDef | [toolbox.ToolboxDefinition](./blockly.utils.toolbox.toolboxdefinition.md) \| null | DOM tree of toolbox contents, string of toolbox contents, or JSON representing toolbox definition. |

**Returns:**

void
